system.description:
Until the spell ends, the target can walk on air as if it were solid ground. The target can move upward or downward at a maximum angle of 45 degrees, at half its speed upwards (like walking up a steep hill) or twice its speed downward.

A strong wind can push the target. At the end of each of the target’s turn, the target is pushed 5 feet for each 5 miles per hour of wind speed. Especially violent or turbulent winds are considered difficult terrain. When the duration ends, the target falls as if affected by a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ak4r2o5c5mrme5vk]{Feather Fall} spell.

You can train a mount to be ridden through the air with castings of this spell. It requires daily casting and training, with one week of work and a DC 20 Animal Handling check. Retries are allowed, but require additional time and work.

Cast at Higher Levels. Target one additional creature for each slot level above 5th.
